lead_paragraph: To the Editor: David Gelernter (''A Religion of Special Effects,'' Op-Ed, March 30) is wrong in writing that ''traditional religion has been suppressed for a generation.'' The Supreme Court rulings he cites ''suppressed'' only improper government intrusion into religion. The rulings enhanced religious freedom and leveled the playing field for all religions and life philosophies, and did so by properly applying the First Amendment.
abstract: Edd Doerr letter disputes David Gelernter's March 30 Op-Ed article on mass suicide of members of Heaven's Gate cult in California (S)

headline.kicker: Cultists' Deaths Call Our Insight Into Question
